steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8smk2","text":"Wash cells 1X with phosphate-buffered saline (PBS, Sigma‒Aldrich) and detach using Accutase.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmrl","text":"Lyse the pellets in IP/lysis buffer (Thermo Fisher, #87787) supplemented with a  protease/phosphatase inhibitor cocktail (Pierce, #A32959). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1so39","text":"Carry out coimmunoprecipitation using the Thermo Fisher Pierce Crosslink Magnetic IP/Co-IP Kit (#88805) according to the manufacturer´s instructions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
